alert.note: Alert for Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Stanley County through 715 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brown Church, or 35 miles west of Fort Pierre, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brown Church around 645 PM MDT. Hayes around 650 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
